summary: REQ-16 appears implemented by changing the Home section “Download Resume” CTA to a static absolute-path PDF link that opens in a new tab, and by documenting the resume PDF as a public static asset. Some non-requested metadata/state files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project metadata/state files beyond the requested resume CTA fix (documentation/state changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to fix the resume download CTA behavior; modifying project state/summary metadata is not requested as part of REQ-16.
